create.legal: Tôi hiểu và đồng ý rằng nội dung tôi sắp sửa tạo là nội dung được sở hữu bởi tôi và không vi phạm bất kì luật sở hữu trí tuệ cũng như luật bản quyền nào. Tôi sẽ hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm cho những hành vi vi phạm điều khoản sử dụng và luật pháp quốc tế. Những tài khoản vi phạm các điều khoản của chúng tôi sẽ bị chấm dứt và các NFT item vi phạm sẽ bị hủy bỏ trên Coconut mà không cần báo trước. Tôi cũng đã đọc kỹ và đồng ý với các điều khoản của Coconut.

howUse.use: How to use Coconut Global with MetaMask Wallet?
howUse.create: How to create a MetaMask Wallet?
howUse.setting: Setting BSC Network on MetaMask Wallet
howUse.setting_head4: Add BUSD and CONUT token to Metamask Wallet
howUse.setting_head4_detail1: When MetaMask reveals your secret words, DO NOT FORGET to write them down
howUse.setting_head4_detail2: This section is bolded so that you don't accidentally skim and lose access to your wallet forever.
howUse.setting_head4_detail4: You will see a 12 words seed phrase.
howUse.setting_head4_detail5: DO NOT store these online, as that can always be a potential security risk. Instead, write these down in a notebook or something you will not misplace. Store it somewhere safe.
howUse.setting_head3_detail1: Click Save to add the BSC. And Done!
howUse.setting_head2_detail1: Select Networks, then Add New network.
howUse.setting_head_detail1: On the MetaMask wallet, click to drop down your accounts and select Settings.
howUse.connect: How to connect to MetaMask Wallet from Coconut Global?
howUse.connect_head2_detail1: When MetaMask Wallet extension open, confirm connect to Coconut Global service.
howUse.connect_head2_detail2: If connect status on MetaMask Wallet is Connected, you can start creating and trading NFTs on our platform.
howUse.connect_head_detail1: Open https://app.coconut.global page and click button “Connect Wallet”
howUse.howCreate_head4: Confirm MetaMask Wallet requests to create NFT item
howUse.howCreate: How can I create an NFT?
howUse.howCreate_head_detail1: You need connect to MetaMask Wallet to create item NFT
howUse.howCreate_define1: If you are wondering how to create a new cryptocurrency wallet, consider creating one by installing the MetaMask extension on your browser.
howUse.howCreate_define2: MetaMask is a free and secure browser extension that allows web applications to read and interact with the Ethereum/Binance Smart Chain blockchain.
howUse.howCreate_step1: To create a new wallet with MetaMask you need to install the extension first. You can install Metamask for Chrome, Firefox, Brave and Opera browsers.
howUse.howCreate_step2: Open https://metamask.io or search for “Metamask extension” using your favorite search engine.
howUse.howCreate_step3: In this tutorial we will be using Google Chrome as an example, but the workflow is the same for all browsers.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step1: Click on the extension icon in your Chrome browser; the extension icon is located in the top right hand corner on Chrome and should be in a similar location on other browsers.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step2: Once MetaMask is open, you may be prompted to either 'Create a Wallet' or 'Import wallet.' If you are first setting up your MetaMask account, select the former. If you have a wallet already, you can select 'Import wallet' and then you will be asked to input your 12 word seed phrase to link your account; we'll tackle the seed phrase below.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step3: Once you've opted to create a new account, you will be asked to accept the terms of use, and then prompted to create a new password. Click Create.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step4: When MetaMask reveals your secret words, DO NOT FORGET to write them down.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step5: This section is bolded so that you don't accidentally skim and lose access to your wallet forever.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step7: You will see a 12 words seed phrase.
howUse.howCreate_head1_step8: DO NOT store these online, as that can always be a potential security risk. Instead, write these down in a notebook or something you will not misplace. Store it somewhere safe.
howUse.howCreate_head2_step1: Now, you can check and log-in MetaMask Wallet in your browers
howUse.howBuy: How can I buy an NFT?
howUse.howBuy_head: First, check Wallet Connecting status, then
howUse.howResell: How can I resell my purchased NFT?
howUse.howResell_head: Choose 1 item in Purchased Item at My-item page
howUse.howResell_head2: Input the price you want to resell this item and confirm
